title: Kana
desc: A food web app to quickly and easily decide what you want to eat. It's like tinder, but for food! Developed over 2 weeks in a team of 3. Currently using React Native to redo the application to eventually deploy live
subtitle: food service app

title: To-Do
desc: A simple personalized to-do list created to keep track of my daily tasks
subtitle: productivity app

title: Memory: The Office Edition
desc: An Office (TV show) themed memory game. Try to match all the cards with using the least amount of 'Tobys' (aka moves/turns)
subtitle: jquery game

desc: A mobile app developed for a new local business, to encourage all people to try new activities and adventures. Uses Tinder-style swiping to find things to do and win awards for completing them
subtitle: social app

title: RMA Admin
desc: A PWA created for a local business to improve client and employee management and communication
subtitle: admin app

title: Online Shop
desc: A simple design of an online shop's webpage and shopping cart
subtitle: shopping cart
